1.title: One-Thousand-Peso Challenge with Ruru Madrid
1.plot: What would you do if Ruru Madrid was that needy friend who suddenly asks you to take him to dinner during his taping break? How will this health-conscious cutie fit into your cost-conscious budget of one thousand pesos? How will Reese Tuazon rise up to the challenge if her only option is a chic restaurant near Ruru's taping location? On 'Thousanaire's' premiere episode, join us on a "RUmantic" one-thousand-peso date with one of 'Sherlock Jr.'s' lead star, Ruru Madrid.

2.title: Beach Essentials Shopping Challenge with Sanya Lopez
2.plot: This summer, can you afford to be beach-ready with just a one thousand-peso budget in your pocket? Let host Reese Tuazon, and beach body girl goal Sanya Lopez show you how it's done. Follow these TGs or 'tipid girls' as they rummage a store for beach essentials. Sounds easy? Not really if it's a shop that hosts a long line of onlinepreneurs and social media sellers; with all their trinkets now coming to life, could being thrifty be easy breezy?

3.title: Beach Getaway Challenge
3.plot: Reese Tuazon is carefully planning for an exciting summer getaway. Can this "Tipid Girl" actually make plans while she's accompanied by two food and adventure-hungry friends Joemarie Nielsen and Jenzel Angeles? Find out.

4.title: One-Thousand-Peso Pasalubong to Australia Challenge
4.plot: Tipid Girl Reese Tuazon is up for a more personal challenge. As she prepares to go on a trip to Australia to visit her dad, she thinks of bringing along a lot of pasalubong that should be: (1) locally-made (which her dad will obviously not find in Australia or US) (2) with a longer expiration date (since she will be going for food pasalubong and her travel will take time) (3) and should exude variety and balance (since she will be buying from the gourmet weekend event at Eastwood Mall) All for the appreciation and delight of her dad. Where will Reese's P1,000.00 take ...

5.title: Maginhawa Street Budget Date with Bruno Gabriel
5.plot: Can Reese Tuazon survive this new adventure with her real life "yayamanin" guy friend, Bruno Gabriel? Watch as she takes this street date challenge along the famous Maginhawa food strip and the Cinema Centenario with just one thousand pesos to spend for both of them.

6.title: One-Thousand-Peso Roadtrip Baon Challenge
6.plot: Want to go thrift shopping for an out of town trip? Learn some tips from the ultimate Tipid Girl Reese Tuazon together with her go-to Summer barkada Jen Angeles and Joemarie Nielsen.

7.title: Food Park Challenge, kasya ba ang P1000?
7.plot: Reese Tuazon lands at Terminal 8 Food Park and Lifestyle Hub with 'Ang forever ko'y ikaw' boys Kelvin Miranda, Joshua Jacobe, and Adrian Pascual. Find out how Reese will work around a budget of one thousand pesos to fit a food park trip for four. Can they stretch their peso as they tour this famous food park in Marikina?

8.title: Korean Disco Pang Pang Challenge
8.plot: Reese Tuazon will go on a disco dare with her friends from 'Ang forever ko'y ikaw' boys, Adrian Pascual, Joshua Jacobe, and Kelvin Miranda. The group will head over to Marikina City for the famous Korean theme park attraction/ride, "Disco Pang Pang." What can they do on a gimmick night for four with just one thousand pesos in this fun and crazy place?

9.title: Office Glam for P1000
9.plot: What could possibly happen when polar opposites Reese Tuazon and Nicki B join forces for an afternoon shopping spree? With one thousand pesos, Reese will give comedienne Nicki B. a corporate makeover to wow her client. Known for her colorful wardrobe, will Nicki B. give in to Reese's neutral choices?

10.title: The Trampoline Park Challenge
10.plot: Watch Reese Tuazon pull off a quick 'Barkada Activity for Three' with her real-life buddies Joemarie Nielsen and Jen Angeles.

11.title: Live like a 'Queen' for P1000
11.plot: This week, Reese is all about ME time. Watch as she tries to indulge herself in some after-work #PampeReese session plus merienda on the side, all under one thousand pesos.

12.title: Nikki Co and Reese Tuazon's Surprise Date for P1000
12.plot: Reese finally gets the chance to spend for herself - on her office, that is. Joining her to shop for office stuff is One Up's Nikki Co who is said to be very good in Math he could very well be Reese's human calculator for the day. Sounds like a lovely shopping trip for two right? But wait till Nikki reveals what he's up to in this episode.

13.title: Be a Master Baker for P1,000
13.plot: It's never too late for a summer activity, Kapuso. Reese Tuazon knows how to cook different recipes but for today's episode, she will learn how to bake in Academy Asia for P1,000. Will she be able to perfect her own Quiche Lorraine, Fruit Tart and Banoffee Pie? Let's all find out.

14.title: How to Create a Pocket Garden for P1,000
14.plot: Want to do a little home upgrade? Or add a little omph to a favorite nook? How about putting in a little dash of green and create a mini garden for only 1000 pesos? You don't need a green thumb for this. Reese will show you how.

15.title: Buying Quality Shoes for P1,000
15.plot: Here's another fun budget adventure as Reese Tuazon goes to Marikina City to buy quality shoes for only P1,000. Will she be able to budget her money in Marikina Shoe Trade Fair Center? Let's all find out.

16.title: Back-to-School Challenge for Php 1000 with Kimpoy Feliciano
16.plot: It's back to school time, Kapuso. Do you already have your complete school supplies? If not, let's join our 'Thousanaire' Girl Reese Tuazon and social media influencer/vlogger Kimpoy Feliciano as they shop some school supplies worth Php 1000.

17.title: Nikki Co and Reese Tuazon's Binondo Date for P1000
17.plot: Reese-Ki serves us some hugot and funny lines as they roam around the streets of Binondo in another kilig episode of 'Thousanaire.'

18.title: P1,000 Treat for Fire Paramedics in Binondo
18.plot: How can Reese Tuazon stretch out her PhP 1,000 budget to feed over seven people, including herself? Find out as she continues her Binondo food trip with the Fire Paramedics Assistant Group in this week's episode of 'Thousanaire.'

19.title: The Ultimate Binondo Tour Experience
19.plot: Reese Tuazon will roam around Chinatown to find the best things you can only do in this area.

20.title: Look Expensive for P1000
20.plot: Reese Tuazon's next adventure is to wear a fashionable and stylish day-and-night outfit for P1000.

21.title: Traditional Chinese Medicine Challenge
21.plot: Nikki Co and Reese Tuazon learn about Traditional Chinese Medicine as they explore the streets of Binondo, Manila. Find out the wonders of Si-but, Pei Pa Koa, Yin Qiao Jie Du Pian, among others in this episode of Thousanaire.

22.title: Make-up Transformation for P1,000
22.plot: Are you ready to witness the best make-up transformation worth P1,000? Reese Tuazon and Nicki Balaj are all set to re-create their looks in a salon in Manila. Let's see their make-over results in this video.

23.title: Bedroom Essentials for P1,000
23.plot: Does your bedroom need a scent makeover? Try this budget-friendly tips by Reese Tuazon in this episode of 'Thousanaire.'

24.title: Bonggang Children's Party for P1000
24.plot: Are you a mom who wants to throw a big party for your kid but has limited budget? Try these budget-friendly tips from Reese Tuazon and Kimpoy Feliciano in this episode of 'Thousanaire.'
